profile:
Professional Gas Heating Appliance Service, Sales, Maintenance and Installations.

"Ryan My Fireplace Guy" is owned and operated by Ryan Fraser and is accredited by the Better Business Bureau. 
​ 
Ryan is a certified gas fitter, with 12+ years of experience and multiple exclusive gas fireplace and furnace training seminars. His knowledge and attention to detail will ensure a top notch fireplace service. He is dedicated to providing a proficient, courteous, and honest service experience. 

Ryan My Fireplace Guy is now supplying a variety of gas appliances such as: Vermont, Majestic, and Empire gas fireplaces, gas fire tables, gas heaters, gas lines to Barbecues, Goodman Furnaces, Bradford White Hot Water Tanks and more. Ryan is also skilled in renovation plumbing installations and specializes in hot water tank installations. 

​Gas fireplaces and furnaces need annual maintenance to ensure safe and proper operation! 


All of the components that make up a gas fireplace or a furnace need to be inspected, tested, adjusted, & cleaned annually in accordance with manufacturer specifications. This is to ensure that the unit is operating safely and efficiently. 

A gas fireplace annual maintenance consists of: 

A series of inspections, tests, and adjustments to ensure the safe efficient operation of your gas fireplace 
Cleaning all components of your fireplace. 
Replace "Glowing Embers" which will enhance the flame and give your fireplace a warm and inviting glow. 
Touch up paint to parts that look worn, or dull.​​ 

A gas furnace maintenance consists of; 

Combustion analysis to get an accurate output efficiency reading of your furnace. This will ensure proper combustion set up and maximum efficiency of your furnace. 

Carbon monoxide test of the heat exchanger to ensure no cracks that would allow poisons exhaust fumes into living area. This test is important because carbon monoxide is a colourless, odorless and extremely deadly gas. 
Standard filter replacement (16*24*1   high performance filter) or if your filter is reusable then a filter maintenance would be performed. 

Visual inspection of furnace and all furnace components 

Low pressure test on your gas valve (as long as the valve is testable) or soapy solution leak detector test,  to ensure you are leak free 

Thorough cleaning of furnace and blower. (not ducts) 

Call Ryan today for all of your gas fitting needs. 

Now accepting Debit, Master Card & Visa

Ryan My Fireplace Guy MAKING CALGARY A SAFER fire PLACE

profile:
We have been serving the Calgary area for over 15 years. In that time we have learned a thing or two about what it takes to be a great gas fitting business. We believe in doing great work and providing exceptional customer service, you can trust us to do the job right and on time.

As a gas fitting contracting business we have the skills and know-how to provide gas fitting solutions for everything from a basement remodel for a single customer to handling multiple communities for a home builder.

We provide gas line installation for new construction, residential, multi-family homes, small commercial, renovations, and custom homes. 

DETACHED GARAGE, GAS LIGHTS, PATIO HEATERS, BARBECUES, OUTDOOR KITCHENS
FIRE PITS, OUTDOOR FIREPLACES, CLOTHES DRYERS  
GAS TO STOVES, FURNACES, HOT WATER TANKS and GARAGE HEATERS

We would love to be part of your next project.
